Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Xorn makes 3 Claw attacks and 1 Bite attack

Abilities.Ability 1: The Xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it
Abilities.Ability 2: Stone Camouflage, The Xorn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain
Abilities.Ability 3: Treasure Sense, The Xorn can pinpoint the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, through scent

Damage Resistances.Damage 1: Piercing and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons
